amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase Women, Infants, and Children (WIC) funding by $23.7 million and reduce the crop insurance program funding by $36 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funds appropriated in the bill for the Women, Infants and Children program by $23.7 million. The increase would be offset by reducing sales commissions on crop insurance from 27.5% to 24.5%.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Obey amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 230 (Roll no. 308).
